title: Children on the fringe
creator_credit: George Pashuk and University of New South Wales. Tertiary Education Research Centre
brief_description: Shows innovatory language stimulation techniques employed in a rural preschool designed for culturally disadvantaged part-Aboriginal and white children. Rationale, teaching strategies, evaluation and outcome are discussed. The relevance of the experiment for Australian preschool education is considered.
